arf.reasoner
Class ReasonerBundleActivator

java.lang.Object
  arf.reasoner.ReasonerService
      arf.reasoner.ReasonerBundleActivator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, Optimiser, Reasoner, Solver, Validator
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlloySATReasoner, FaMaReasonerActivator, PartitioningReasoner, RandomReasoner, RuntimeReasoner
public abstract class ReasonerBundleActivator
extends ReasonerService
implements Reasoner, org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator

This class is an abstract class which can be used for reasoner, which are implemented in a bundle and are also an activator. This class registers the reasoner as service with all supported questions, and model classes.

The service is registered for the following properties:

  1. ReasonerManager.DICTIONARY_ENTRY_REASONER->Reasoner.getName()
  2. Question.getName()->Reasoner.getName()
  3. ModelHandle.class.getName()->Reasoner.getName()
  4. InputHandle.class.getName()->Reasoner.getName()
